LanguageData.CE_Gunpowder.label: димний порох
LanguageData.CE_Gunpowder.description: Craft early muzzle loading weapons and black powder ammunition.
LanguageData.CE_Launchers.label: прості пускові пристрої
LanguageData.CE_Launchers.description: Allows for the production of basic grenade and rocket launchers.
LanguageData.CE_AdvancedLaunchers.label: покращені пускові пристроїї
LanguageData.CE_AdvancedLaunchers.description: Allows for the production of more advanced launchers and munitions like the incendiary, triple rocket, or doomsday launcher and time-fuzed explosives.
LanguageData.CE_AdvancedAmmo.label: покращена амуніція
LanguageData.CE_AdvancedAmmo.description: Allows for the production of advanced ammunition for small arms and light weapons systems like armor-piercing incendiary, sabot, and high-explosive rounds.
LanguageData.CE_SimpleNV.label: основи оптоелектроніки
LanguageData.CE_SimpleNV.description: Allows for the production of simple electro-optical devices, like night vision goggles.
LanguageData.CE_AdvancedNV.label: покращена оптоелектроніка
LanguageData.CE_AdvancedNV.description: Allows for the production of more advanced and specialized electro-optical devices, including better night vision goggles.
